title: What is Logos - A Symbolic Worldview
description:
A brief description of the notion of Logos based on the Gospel of St-John and the writings of St-Maximos the Confessor. 

For the whole talk: https://youtu.be/xqsfB8tK_wE

This talk was given in the context of an event in Toronto called "Resurection of Logos" organized the UofT OCF in March 2017.  

The event was originally posted in its entirety on the the channel of Jordan B. Peterson.
https://youtu.be/KVo5hq64B2M

For more on St-Maximos, I recommend the book by fr.Andrew Louth: 
https://azbyka.ru/otechnik/assets/uploads/books/18404/Andrew%20Louth%20Maximus%20the%20Confessor%20Early%20Church%20Fathers.pdf   For man as microcosm and the place where all of creation comes together, see from page 69: The division of Being.   

Also for more detailed reading, here is a paper that deal with the Anthropic Theology of St-Maximos and relates it to the Anthropic notion of modern physics.  http://www.jirrs.org/jirrs_nr_3/06-01-jirrs3-bahrim.pdf
